abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Berlin Radio Choir concert, featuring works by Heinrich Schutz, Bach, Brahms, Schoenberg and Knut Nystedt, at Church of St Mary the Virgin as part of Lincoln Center's White Light Festival.

keywords.value: Church of St Mary the Virgin
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts

lead_paragraph: In the program “Immortal Bach,” part of the White Light Festival, the ensemble sang works by Heinrich Schütz, Bach, Brahms, Schoenberg and Knut Nystedt.
snippet: In the program “Immortal Bach,” part of the White Light Festival, the ensemble sang works by Heinrich Schütz, Bach, Brahms, Schoenberg and Knut Nystedt....

headline.main: Review: Berlin Radio Choir Honors Bach and Those He Influenced
headline.print_headline: Voices Honoring Bach and Those He Influenced, and One Who Influenced Him
